changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE, password VARCHAR NOT NULL, points INT DEFAULT 0 );

changeSet.author: Lizogubov Eugeny
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user_role ( user_id INTEGER NOT NULL, role VARCHAR NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT uk_user_role UNIQUE (user_id, role), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (id) ON DELETE CASCADE );
